languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}До меня дошли сведения{/d}, Лорд-капитан, что у вас сложились особо тесные отношения с другим членом свиты". {n}В голосе Хейнрикса больше нет и капли былого тепла.{/n} "Желаю вам, чтобы они сложились удачно. Что ж, теперь давайте перейдем к делам".

traits.locale_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}До меня дошли сведения{/d}, Лорд-капитан, что у вас сложились особо тесные отношения с другим членом свиты". {n}В голосе Хейнрикса больше нет и капли былого тепла.{/n} "Желаю вам, чтобы они сложились удачно. Что ж, теперь давайте перейдем к делам".

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}It has come to my attention{/d}, Lord Captain, that you have formed a particularly close relationship with another member of the retinue." {n}Heinrix's voice is devoid of even a hint of its former warmth.{/n} "I wish you well in this new association. Now let us discuss other matters."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}До меня дошли сведения{/d}, Лорд-капитан, что у вас сложились особо тесные отношения с другим членом свиты". {n}В голосе Хейнрикса больше нет и капли былого тепла.{/n} "Желаю вам, чтобы они сложились удачно. Что ж, теперь давайте перейдем к делам".

traits.locale_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}It has come to my attention{/d}, Lord Captain, that you have formed a particularly close relationship with another member of the retinue." {n}Heinrix's voice is devoid of even a hint of its former warmth.{/n} "I wish you well in this new association. Now let us discuss other matters."

Now let us discuss other matters."

Now let us discuss other matters."

Now let us discuss other matters."

"{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}It has come to my attention{/d}, Lord Captain, that you have formed a particularly close relationship with another member of the retinue." {n}Heinrix's voice is devoid of even a hint of its former warmth.{/n} "I wish you well in this new association. Now let us discuss other matters."

languages.text: «{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Ha llegado a mis oídos{/d}, Lord Capitán, que ha desarrollado una relación particularmente cercana con otro miembro de su séquito». {n}La voz de Heinrix carece del más mínimo ápice de su calidez anterior.{/n} «Le deseo lo mejor en esa nueva asociación. Ahora, hablemos de otros asuntos».
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}It has come to my attention{/d}, Lord Captain, that you have formed a particularly close relationship with another member of the retinue." {n}Heinrix's voice is devoid of even a hint of its former warmth.{/n} "I wish you well in this new association. Now let us discuss other matters."

languages.text: 「{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}存じておりましたよ{/d}、ロード・キャプテン。あなたが従者の中の一人と、特に親密な関係を築いておられることは」{n}ハインリックスの声には、以前あった温かさは微塵もない。{/n}「この新たな関係がうまくいくといいですね。では、他の件についてお話しましょう」
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}It has come to my attention{/d}, Lord Captain, that you have formed a particularly close relationship with another member of the retinue." {n}Heinrix's voice is devoid of even a hint of its former warmth.{/n} "I wish you well in this new association. Now let us discuss other matters."

traits.locale_text: 「{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}存じておりましたよ{/d}、ロード・キャプテン。あなたが従者の中の一人と、特に親密な関係を築いておられることは」{n}ハインリックスの声には、以前あった温かさは微塵もない。{/n}「この新たな関係がうまくいくといいですね。では、他の件についてお話しましょう」

languages.text: “舰长大人，{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}我注意到{/d}，你已经与另一名随行人员建立了极为亲密的关系。”{n}海因里希的声音中再也没有任何昔日的温暖。{/n}“祝你在这场新的关系中一帆风顺。好了，我们还是讨论些别的事情吧。”
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}It has come to my attention{/d}, Lord Captain, that you have formed a particularly close relationship with another member of the retinue." {n}Heinrix's voice is devoid of even a hint of its former warmth.{/n} "I wish you well in this new association. Now let us discuss other matters."

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}Mir wurde zugetragen, {/d}, Lord Captain, dass Ihr mit einem anderen Mitglied Eures Gefolges eine besonders enge Bindung eingegangen seid." {n}Die einstige Wärme in Heinrixs Stimme ist gänzlich verschwunden.{/n} "Ich wünsche Euch alles Gute für diese neue Partnerschaft. Und jetzt lasst uns über etwas anderes sprechen."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}It has come to my attention{/d}, Lord Captain, that you have formed a particularly close relationship with another member of the retinue." {n}Heinrix's voice is devoid of even a hint of its former warmth.{/n} "I wish you well in this new association. Now let us discuss other matters."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}j'ai appris{/d} que vous aviez noué une relation particulièrement intime avec une autre personne de votre entourage, {n}déclare Heinrix d'une voix dénuée de sa chaleur habituelle.{/n} Je vous souhaite beaucoup de bonheur en sa compagnie. Et maintenant, passons à autre chose. »
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}It has come to my attention{/d}, Lord Captain, that you have formed a particularly close relationship with another member of the retinue." {n}Heinrix's voice is devoid of even a hint of its former warmth.{/n} "I wish you well in this new association. Now let us discuss other matters."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, maiyetinin başka bir mensubuyla oldukça yakın bir ilişki kurduğun {d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}dikkatimi çekti{/d}." {n}Heinrix'in sesi, eski sıcaklığının en ufak zerresinden bile yoksun.{/n} "Bu yeni birlikte sana mutluluklar diliyorum. Şimdi diğer konulardan bahsedebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:MiniJealousyRomanceBroken}It has come to my attention{/d}, Lord Captain, that you have formed a particularly close relationship with another member of the retinue." {n}Heinrix's voice is devoid of even a hint of its former warmth.{/n} "I wish you well in this new association. Now let us discuss other matters."
